program.ppgu: res = (ppuv[i+1,j,k] - ppuv[i,j,k]) + (ppgc[i+1,j,k] + ppgc[i,j,k]) * 0.5 * ((hhl[i,j,k+1] + hhl[i,j,k]) - (hhl[i+1,j,k+1] + hhl[i+1,j,k])) /  ((hhl[i, j, k + 1] - hhl[i, j, k]) + (hhl[i + 1, j, k + 1] - hhl[i + 1, j, k]));
program.ppgv: res = (ppuv[i,j+1,k] - ppuv[i,j,k]) + (ppgc[i,j+1,k] + ppgc[i,j,k]) * 0.5 * ((hhl[i,j,k+1] + hhl[i,j,k]) - (hhl[i,j+1,k+1] + hhl[i,j+1,k])) / ((hhl[i,j,k+1] - hhl[i,j,k]) + (hhl[i,j+1,k+1] - hhl[i,j+1,k]));
program.udc: res = wgt * uout[i, j, k] + (1.0 - wgt) * uout[i, j, k - 1];wgt = 0.5 * (wgtfac[i,j,k] + wgtfac[i+1,j,k])
program.vdc: res = wgt * vout[i,j,k] + (1.0 - wgt) * vout[i,j,k-1];wgt = 0.5 * (wgtfac[i,j,k] + wgtfac[i,j+1,k])
program.div: res = 0.1 * ((udc[i,j,k+1] - udc[i,j,k]) * dzdx[i,j,k] + uout[i,j,k]) + 0.1 * ((udc[i-1,j,k+1] - udc[i-1,j,k]) * dzdx[i-1,j,k] - uout[i-1,j,k]) + 0.2 * ((vdc[i,j,k+1] - vdc[i,j,k]) * dzdy[i,j,k] + vout[i,j,k]) + 0.3 * ((vdc[i,j-1,k+1] - vdc[i,j-1,k]) * dzdy[i,j-1,k] - vout[i,j-1,k]);
